languages.text: {n}Разряд пробегает по проводам, окутывающим голову техножреца, и вокс-система под потолком разражается суровым шипением. Тихий, будто скованный дремой голос обращается к вам со строгостью:{/n} "Не убоюсь я врага, ибо Движущая Сила со мною, и поразит всякого поднявшего руку на праведника ее карающий разряд".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс под потолком разражается злобным шипением.{/n} "Не убоюсь я врага, ибо Движущая Сила со мною, и поразит она тебя, если посмеешь вновь поднять на меня руку".

languages.text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."
languages.original_text: {n}Разряд пробегает по проводам, окутывающим голову техножреца, и вокс-система под потолком разражается суровым шипением. Тихий, будто скованный дремой голос обращается к вам со строгостью:{/n} "Не убоюсь я врага, ибо Движущая Сила со мною, и поразит всякого поднявшего руку на праведника ее карающий разряд".

traits.locale_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the mummy's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system under the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it's struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly.{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

A soft voice, sounding as though it's struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly.{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

{n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

{n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the mummy's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

languages.text: {n}Eine Entladung fährt durch die Kabel um den Kopf des Techpriesters, und ein bedrohliches Zischen ertönt aus dem Voxsystem an der Decke. Eine sanfte Stimme spricht dich streng an. Sie klingt, als würde sie sich mühen, ihre verschlafene Trägheit abzuschütteln.{/n} "Ich fürchte keinen Feind, denn die Antriebskraft ist in mir, und ihre Entladung wird jeden niederstrecken, der seine Hände gegen die Rechtschaffenen erhebt."
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Entladung fährt durch die Kabel um den Kopf der Mumie, und ein bedrohliches Zischen ertönt aus dem Voxsystem unter der Decke. Eine sanfte Stimme spricht dich streng an. Sie klingt, als würde sie sich mühen, ihre verschlafene Trägheit abzuschütteln.{/n} "Ich fürchte keinen Feind, denn die Antriebskraft ist in mir, und ihre Entladung wird jeden niederstrecken, der seine Hände gegen die Rechtschaffenen erhebt."

languages.text: {n}Une décharge électrique parcourt les câbles qui ceignent la tête du technoprêtre, et vous entendez un sifflement inquiétant sortir du système-vox fixé au plafond. Une voix douce, semblant chercher à surmonter sa torpeur rêveuse, s'adresse à vous d'un ton sévère.{/n} « Je ne craindrai nul ennemi, car la Force Motrice est avec moi et ses décharges frapperont quiconque porte la main sur les justes. »
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une décharge électrique court dans les câbles qui ceignent la tête de la momie, et vous entendez un sifflement inquiétant sortir du système-vox fixé sous le plafond. Une voix douce, semblant chercher à surmonter sa torpeur rêveuse, s'adresse à vous d'un ton sévère.{/n} « Je ne craindrai nul ennemi, car la Force Motrice est avec moi et ses décharges frapperont quiconque porte la main sur les justes. »

languages.text: {n}电流流过了缠着技术神甫头部的电线，天花板内置的音阵系统发出了令人生畏的嘶嘶声。某个温和的声音以严肃的语调对你开了口，仿佛在努力从梦境中醒来。{/n}“我不惧怕任何敌人，因为源力与我同在。它的电击将击溃任何胆敢冒犯正义的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}电流流过了缠着干尸头部的电线，天花板下的音阵系统发出了令人生畏的嘶嘶声。某个温和的声音以严肃的语调对你开了口，仿佛在努力从梦境中醒来。{/n}“我不惧怕任何敌人，因为原初动力与我同在。它的电击将击溃任何胆敢冒犯正义的人。”

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の頭を覆うケーブルから放電が起こり、威嚇するようなジューッという音が天井のヴォクスから聞こえてくる。夢見心地から懸命に覚めようとするかのような柔らかな声が、あなたに厳かに語りかける。{/n}「俺に恐れる敵はない。動力が共に在り、動力の放電が高潔な者に手を挙げる者を打ちのめすからだ」
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}ミイラの頭を覆うケーブルから放電が起こり、威嚇するようなジューッと言う音が天井下のヴォクスから聞こえてくる。夢見心地から懸命に覚めようとするような柔らかな声が、あなたに厳しく語りかける。{/n}「俺に恐れる敵はない。動力が共に在り、動力の放電が高潔な者に手を挙げる者を打ちのめすからだ」

languages.text: {n}Una descarga recorre los cables que envuelven la cabeza del tecnosacerdote, y un insoportable silbido procede del sistema de voco del techo. Una voz suave, que parece esforzarse por superar su letargo onírico, se dirige a ti con firmeza:{/n} «No temo a ningún enemigo, porque la Fuerza Motriz está conmigo, y su descarga herirá a cualquiera que levante sus manos contra los justos».
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una descarga recorre los cables que envuelven la cabeza de la momia, y un insoportable silbido procede del sistema de voco bajo el techo. Una voz suave, que parece esforzarse por superar su letargo onírico, se dirige a ti con firmeza.{/n} «No temo a ningún enemigo, porque la Fuerza Motriz está conmigo, y su descarga herirá a cualquiera que levante sus manos contra los justos».

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in başını saran kablolarda bir elektrik deşarjı meydana geliyor ve tavandaki voks sisteminden haşin bir tıslama duyuluyor. Kulağa tıpkı uykunun verdiği uyuşukluğu üstünden atmak ister gibi gelen hafif bir ses, sana sert bir tonla hitap ediyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü benimledir. Bundandır ki hiçbir hasımdan korkmam. Erdemlilere el kaldıran her kim olursa olsun, onun cereyanlarıyla cezasını çekecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}A discharge runs through the wires that envelop the Tech-Priest's head, and a forbidding hiss comes from the vox-system on the ceiling. A soft voice, sounding as though it is struggling to overcome its dreamy torpor, addresses you sternly:{/n} "I shall fear no enemy, for the Motive Force is with me, and its discharge will smite any who lift their hands against the righteous."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in başını saran kablolarda bir elektrik deşarjı meydana geliyor ve tavandaki voks sisteminden haşin bir tıslama duyuluyor. Kulağa tıpkı uykunun verdiği uyuşukluğu üstünden atmak ister gibi gelen hafif bir ses, sana sert bir tonla hitap ediyor.{/n} "Devinim Gücü benimledir. Bundandır ki hiçbir hasımdan korkmam.
